candidates.description: This is a Next.js, Tailwind CSS blogging starter template. Comes out of the box configured with the latest technologies to make technical writing a breeze. Easily configurable and customizable. Perfect as a replacement to existing Jekyll and Hugo individual blogs.
candidates.rationale: usefulness=10/30 baseline; integration=22/25 (TypeScript); maintenance=20/20 (stars=10301, updated=2025-12-31T15:03:50Z); license=15/15 (MIT); time_to_value=10/10

candidates.description: ⚡️  一个 Next.js (v16) 快速启动模板, 集成 Tailwind CSS (v4) + React (v19) + Nextra (v4) + TypeScript + Shadcn UI + Radix UI + Aceternity UI + ESLint(v9) + Sass, 支持 Iconify 图标集, i18n 多语言国际化 - 响应式、暗黑模式落地页、适合开发个人博客 Blog Starter Template, 含示例代码, Deployed on Netlify and Vercel.
candidates.rationale: usefulness=10/30 baseline; integration=22/25 (TypeScript); maintenance=20/20 (stars=273, updated=2025-12-30T09:16:33Z); license=15/15 (MIT); time_to_value=7/10

candidates.description: The open-source storefront for any ecommerce. Built with a headless approach, using a modern JS stack. Works with Litekart, Medusa. WIP for Shopify.
candidates.rationale: usefulness=10/30 baseline; integration=12/25 (Svelte); maintenance=20/20 (stars=1758, updated=2025-12-27T16:12:26Z); license=15/15 (MIT); time_to_value=7/10

candidates.description: Typography driven, feature-rich blogging theme with minimal aesthetics. Includes tags/categories support and extensive features for code blocks such as live preview, line numbers, and line highlighting.
candidates.rationale: usefulness=10/30 baseline; integration=12/25 (MDX); maintenance=20/20 (stars=1153, updated=2025-12-28T13:48:25Z); license=15/15 (0BSD); time_to_value=7/10
